import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-flights', templateUrl: './flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./flights.component.css'] }) export class FlightsComponent { isLoading = false flights: any[] = [] constructor(private http:HttpClient){ this.isLoading = true this.http.get('http://localhost:5100/flights').subscribe((res) => { this.flights = res this.isLoading = false }) } }

    Flights

    Loading...
  • FLIGHT NAME

    FLIGHT NUMBER:

    Departure:

    Destination:
    {{ flight.airline }}

    Flight number: {{ flight.flightNumber }}

    Departure: {{ flight.origin }}

    Destination: {{ flight.destination }}
